    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionDelete

        public ActionDelete(java.lang.String text,
                    javax.swing.Icon icon,
                    java.lang.String desc,
                    java.lang.String selectedKey,
                    ModelAgenda model,
                    javax.swing.JList list,
                    javax.swing.JComponent frame)
        The action used by buttons (menu buttons) to delete a selected contact. This action can have text, description and an icon.
        Parameters:
        text - : the text of the button
        icon - : the icon of the button
        desc - : the description of what the button do
        selectedKey - : the selected contact to delete
        model - : the model to allows property file access. See ModelAgenda
        list - : the contact list
        frame - : the frame that called the action
